name: Reference - CAR-2020-09-003: Indicator Blocking - Driver Unloaded - MITRE
x_kb_abstract: Adversaries may attempt to evade system defenses by unloading minifilter drivers used by host-based sensors such as Sysmon through the use of the fltmc command-line utility. Accordingly, this analytic looks for command-line invocations of this utility when used to unload minifilter drivers.
